#!/bin/ash
# GitHub Runner Installation Script

# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Get latest version version

LATEST_VERSION=$(curl $API_URL | grep '"tag_name":' | cut -d '"' -f 4 | sed 's/^v//')

# Download GitHub Runner files
curl -o actions-runner-linux-x64-${LATEST_VERSION}.tar.gz -L https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/download/v${LATEST_VERSION}/actions-runner-linux-x64-${LATEST_VERSION}.tar.gz
# Extract it
tar xzf ./actions-runner-linux-x64-${LATEST_VERSION}.tar.gz

# Delete the tar.gz and ./config.sh
rm ./actions-runner-linux-x64-${LATEST_VERSION}.tar.gz
rm ./config.sh

# Download config.sh without permissions checker
curl -o config.sh -L https://gist.githubusercontent.com/TonimatasDEV/56ea8449f562a07fbe4d7e65f0509cc2/raw/bbb01aedd877e39cbb28b33bd11f719138af474f/config.sh
# Give permission to config.sh
chmod +x ./config.sh
# Run config.sh with all variables
./config.sh --unattended --url ${RUNNER_URL} --token ${RUNNER_TOKEN} --name ${RUNNER_NAME} --runnergroup ${RUNNER_GROUP}

# Finish
echo -e "Install Complete"
